results.t: Charizard Pokédex: stats, moves, evolution & locations

results.p: Mega Charizard X is an extremely strong wallbreaker and setup sweeper that can offensively pressure key Steel- and Grass-types such as Magearna, Ferrothorn, ...
An orange, dragon-like Pokémon, Charizard is the evolved form of Charmeleon and the final evolution of Charmander. It also has two "Mega Evolved" forms, Mega ...
Charizard is a Fire & Flying Pokémon which evolves from Charmeleon. It is vulnerable to Rock, Water and Electric moves. Charizard's strongest moveset is Fire ...
Overview. Blessed with being the only Pokemon in OU with two Mega Evolutions, Charizard has found both of them to be top-tier threats.
